thread.title: BRIEF-Balfour Beatty Joint Venture Awarded $1.95 bln Contract By Los Angeles World Airports For Automated People Mover

title: BRIEF-Balfour Beatty Joint Venture Awarded $1.95 bln Contract By Los Angeles World Airports For Automated People Mover

organizations.name: los angeles world airports for automated people mover reuters staff

text: February 20, 2018 / 4:13 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Balfour Beatty Joint Venture Awarded $1.95 bln Contract By Los Angeles World Airports For Automated People Mover Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 20 (Reuters) - Balfour Beatty Plc: * BALFOUR BEATTY JOINT VENTURE AWARDED $1.95 BILLION CONTRACT BY LOS ANGELES WORLD AIRPORTS FOR AUTOMATED PEOPLE MOVER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
